main.name: Ashish Kumar
main.description: I am a pre-final year student at Institute of Engineering and Rural Technology, Allahabad.
main.bio: I am a pre-final year student at Institute of Engineering and Rural Technology, Allahabad.My major is Computer Science and Engineering and I do Problem Solving (Data Structures and Algorithms) for fun.I currently practise at Hackerrank. I have solved over several problems on Hackerrank.I am well versed with Computer Science fundamentals like OOPS, Operating Systems, Database Management Systems, Computer Networks and also have keen interest in High Level System Design.I have built few projects on Android using Java, web development in java , and currently exploring Al & Deep Learning concept using Python.I am interested and open to interview as an intern in Software Engineering domain.
